item.title: Installing and Using VNC
item.description: sudo apt update sudo apt install -y xfce4 xfce4-goodies tightvncserver vncserver vncpasswd vnc password ***** vncserver -kill :1 mv ~/.

item.title: Laser Cutter General Maintenance
item.description: Cleaning Using Goof-off, clean the inside of the laser cutter to remove stuck on gunk and crud Use compressed air to remove dust and grime from the inside of the machine the hidden collumnator lens should be cleaned occasionally Replacing the Pulley Remove the blue cover Remove the four motor housing screws, unplug it from its board, and set aside Remove the small gray belt On the other side of the machine, loosen the two screws and two hex bolts that permit the X-travel belt to be loosened.

item.title: linux cheatsheet
item.description: Find Kernel version uname -r Device / driver info lsmod lspci -k dmesg search path .

item.title: Looping Video into Zoom
item.description: sudo apt-get install v4l2loopback-dkms v4l2-utils ls /dev/video* sudo modprobe v4l2loopback video_nr=9 ffmpeg -stream_loop -1 -re -i 2020-10-01-110554.

item.title: Port Forwarding Cheatsheet
item.description: ssh -L (localport):localhost:(remoteport) -C -N -l (username) hostname.domain -p (sshport) VNC Example ssh into port 22 on mydynamichost.
